text: KMS Tools & Equipment Ltd. is a Canadian chain of industrial supply stores. They are headquartered in Coquitlam, British Columbia. They have 14 store locations across British Columbia and Alberta. They sell product such as industrial tools and parts for vehicles. In 1983, Stan Pridham opened the first KMS Tools store in Coquitlam, British Columbia. The company runs their own charity program called Tools for the World which helps rebuilds struggling communities. KMS Tools hosts a car show called the Show & Shine which where people show up to show off their classic and custom cars. In 2009, House of Tools filed for bankruptcy and KMS Tools decided to purchase the company. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1983 establishments in Canada Category:Companies based in British Columbia Category:Hardware stores of Canada
title: KMS Tools
